name: Super Choco Cake
description:
The game focuses on a chocolate cake bound to get past 3 levels without getting sliced by spikes. Touch a spike and the game resets back to the first level, so you must guide the chocolate cake to victory by following a door leading to the second level with another door leading to the final level with yet another door leading to victory. If you fall, there is the restart button for you to restart the game.

Rule: Complete the levels WITHOUT cheating on the second and final levels. There will be lots of cheating ways that you cannot do when it comes to the second and final levels, e.g (Jump as many times as you can, skip the platforms to find the doors, etc).

Controls:

Left Arrow Key / A = Left

Right Arrow Key / D = Right

Spacebar = Jump

R = Restart the game

Credit:

Acoustic Breeze by Benjamin Tissot on Bensound.com

Congratulations by TibaSound on EnvatoMarket
